name: Tri vs Tri
description:
Tri vs Tri is a simple 1v1 game that involves shooting, collecting bonuses and upgrades.

You only need 1 finger/touch/key to play this game

Features
  • Shoot bullets with certain fire speed, rate, level and power.
  • Round countdown which is the win condition.
  • Different upgrades with stock and price (per stock).
  • Items moving down to collect (Start, Diamond, Hitpoint, etc).
  • Walls that bounce bullets.
  • More updates coming up (Read There's more section)
Hello World

This is my first game (made with Unity3D), I will update the game and need your awesome feedback ❤.

You can contribute to the game too, here's the github project.

I also have plans to make this game available in Google Play, App Store, Windows Store, Facebook and other platforms.

There's more
  • More items falling (Shield, Freeze, Bomb, etc...)
  • Play Online or with Bot
  • XP, Level and Achievement system
  • Select or Upload triangle skins
  • More types of bullets with different style
